name: hablar
description: A JavaScript library useful for compiling i18n translations in a custom language to JavaScript functions.

scripts.build: rm -rf lib && mkdir lib/parsers/grammars && (cd lib/parsers/grammars; find ../../../src/parsers/grammars -iname '*.jison' -exec jison -m commonjs {} \;) && tsc
scripts.prepublish: npm run verify && npm run build

author: Kaare Hoff Skovgaard <khs@secoya.dk>
